/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the cityscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
